```{r}
EDD.GET_names <- read.csv("./data/EDD_GET levels names.csv") %>%
                 mutate(GET_L2.code_text = paste(IUCN_GET_2025_L2, GET_L2.text, sep = ": ")) %>%
                 mutate(GET_L3.code_text = paste(IUCN_GET_2022_L3, GET_L3.text, sep = ": ")) %>%
                 select(Realm_GETL1, Code, EcosystemType_GETLevel5_6, RLE_2025, EPL_2025, GET_L2.code_text, GET_L3.code_text) %>%

                 mutate(Realm = case_when(Realm_GETL1 == "Freshwater_Wetland" ~ "Wetland",
                 Realm_GETL1 == "Freshwater_River"   ~ "River", TRUE ~ Realm_GETL1),
                 RLE.2025 = case_when(RLE_2025 == "LC" ~ "Least Concern",
                 RLE_2025 == "VU" ~ "Vulnerable",
                 RLE_2025 == "EN" ~ "Endangered", TRUE ~ "Critically Endangered"))
```

```{r}
# ------------------------------------------
# 1. Total per Realm, GET_L2 & RLE category
# ------------------------------------------

#  -------1. Count per Realm × GET_L2 x RLE category -------
GET_L2.long <- EDD.GET_names %>%
               group_by(Realm, GET_L2.code_text, RLE.2025) %>%
               summarise(Count = n_distinct(GET_L2.code_text), .groups = "drop" )

#  -------2. Count per Realm × RLE category -------
GET_L2.count <- EDD.GET_names %>%
               group_by(Realm, RLE.2025) %>%
               summarise(Count = n_distinct(GET_L2.code_text), .groups = "drop" )

#  -------3. Sum per Realm × RLE category -------
GET_L2.sum <- GET_L2.count %>%
              group_by(Realm, RLE.2025) %>%
              summarise(Count = sum(Count), .groups = "drop")
```

```{r}

library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(scales)
library(grid)
library(stringr)

plot_rle_bar <- function(data,
                         group_var,
                         rle_var,
                         count_var,
                         chart = c("percent", "count"),
                         show  = c("percent", "count", "none"),
                         show_legend = TRUE,
                         caption = NULL,
                         text_size = 12,
                         label_size = 3,
                         wrap_width = 25,
                         bar_width = 0.7) {

  # ---- ARGUMENT MATCHING ----
  chart <- match.arg(chart)
  show  <- match.arg(show)

  # ---- BAR POSITION TYPE ----
  pos_type <- ifelse(chart == "percent", "fill", "stack")

  # ---- BASE PLOT SETUP ----
  p <- ggplot(
    data,
    aes(
      y    = {{ group_var }},
      x    = {{ count_var }},
      fill = factor(
        {{ rle_var }},
        levels = c("Least Concern",
                   "Vulnerable",
                   "Endangered",
                   "Critically Endangered")
      )
    )
  )

  # ---- VERTICAL REFERENCE LINES (PERCENT ONLY) ----
  if (chart == "percent") {
    p <- p + geom_vline(
      xintercept = c(0, 0.5, 1),
      colour = "grey80",
      linewidth = 0.5
    )
  }

  # ---- BAR GEOMETRY ----
  p <- p + geom_bar(
    stat     = "identity",
    position = pos_type,
    width    = bar_width
  )

  # ---- REMOVE GAP BETWEEN BARS ----
  p <- p + scale_y_discrete(expand = c(0, 0))

  # ---- FILL COLOURS & LEGEND ----
  p <- p + scale_fill_manual(
    values = c("#B4D79E", "yellow", "orange", "red"),
    name   = "Threat categories"
  )

  # ---- AXIS LABELS & CAPTION ----
  p <- p + labs(
    x = ifelse(chart == "percent",
               "Percentage of ecosystem types",
               "Count of ecosystem types"),
    y = NULL,
    caption = caption
  )

  # ---- THEME SETTINGS ----
  p <- p +
    theme_minimal() +
    theme(
      text               = element_text(size = text_size),
      legend.key.height  = unit(0.7, "cm"),
      legend.key.width   = unit(0.6, "cm"),
      plot.caption       = element_text(hjust = 0.2,
                                        size = text_size - 2),
      panel.grid.major.x = element_blank(),
      panel.grid.minor.x = element_blank()
    )

  # ---- Y-AXIS LABEL WRAPPING ----
  p <- p +
    scale_y_discrete(
      labels = function(x) str_wrap(x, width = wrap_width)
    ) +
    theme(
      axis.text.y = element_text(
        hjust = 0,
        margin = margin(r = 5)
      )
    )

  # ---- BAR LABELS (COUNTS, ALIGNED WITH CHART TYPE) ----
  if (show == "count") {

    label_position <- if (chart == "percent") {
      position_fill(vjust = 0.5)
    } else {
      position_stack(vjust = 0.5)
    }

    p <- p +
      geom_text(
        aes(label = {{ count_var }}),
        position = label_position,
        size = label_size
      )
  }

  # ---- X-AXIS SCALE (PERCENT ONLY) ----
  if (chart == "percent") {
    p <- p + scale_x_continuous(
      breaks = c(0, 0.5, 1),
      labels = scales::percent_format(accuracy = 1)
    )
  }

  # ---- SHOW OR HIDE LEGEND ----
  if (!show_legend) {
    p <- p + theme(legend.position = "none")
  }

  return(p)
}
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
# ---- PLOTS ----
GetL2_plot <- GET_L2.sum %>%
              plot_rle_bar(group_var = Realm,
                           rle_var   = RLE.2025,
                           count_var = Count,
                           chart     = "percent",
                           show      = "count",
                           show_legend = FALSE,
                           wrap_width = 25,
                           bar_width = 0.5)

GetL3_plot <- GET_L3.sum  %>%
              plot_rle_bar(group_var = Realm,
                           rle_var   = RLE.2025,
                           count_var = Count,
                           chart     = "percent",
                           show      = "count",
                           show_legend = FALSE,
                           wrap_width = 25,
                           bar_width = 0.5)

plots <- ggpubr::ggarrange(GetL2_plot,
                           GetL3_plot,
                           ncol = 2,
                           nrow = 1,
                           common.legend = TRUE,
                           legend = "bottom",
                           labels = c("A", "B"),
                           align = "hv")

plots
```
